item.description:
Check out the party in the Wadsworth. Dance music by 96.5 WTIC-FM, food and drink is always good. Party runs from 5-8 pm. Movie starts at 8:00 pm. I'll be there by 7:00 pm.

The movie is Dr. Strangelove. Directed by Stanley Kubrick and starring Peter Sellers in this black, satirical look at Doomsday. Set in 1964 at the height of the Cold War (US and Russia - ah, the good old days when you knew who your enemy was) with Slim Pickens, Charleston Heston.

Entrance to the Wadsworth is $5.00 for non-members. THe movie is $9.00 for non-members.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there plus I still have a ponytail )glass .

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Phoenix After Hours + Dr. Strangelove
